text.section:
A person may not cause the death of another as a result of the person's negligently driving, operating, or controlling a motor vehicle or vessel while:
under the influence of alcohol; or
under the influence of alcohol per se.

A violation of this section is:
homicide by motor vehicle or vessel while under the influence of alcohol; or
homicide by motor vehicle or vessel while under the influence of alcohol per se.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or a fine not exceeding $5,000 or both.
